comments.comments_text: Florian Grillitsch (Hoffenheim) pulls the jersey of one of the opposition players and Jakob Kehlet blows his whistle for a foul. What was Florian Grillitsch (Hoffenheim) thinking? He will not get away with that. The referee shows him a yellow card. Free kick. Shakhtar Donetsk will probably just try to cross the ball in from here.

comments.comments_text: Havard Nordtveit (Hoffenheim) connects with the ball from the resulting corner and places a precise header past the stranded goalkeeper and into the top left corner.
